mapper.update: update jeju_user set email=#{email}, password=password(#{password}), nickname=#{nickname}, active=#{active}, emoji=#{emoji} where user_no=#{no}
mapper.select: select user_no, email, nickname, created_dt, view_cnt, active, emoji from jeju_user where active=1 and email=#{email} and password=password(#{password})
mapper.update: update jeju_user set active = 0 where user_no=#{userNo}
mapper.select: select user_no, email, nickname, created_dt, view_cnt, active, emoji from jeju_user order by user_no desc
select user_no, email, nickname, created_dt, view_cnt, emoji from jeju_user where user_no=#{no}
select user_no, email, nickname, created_dt, view_cnt, emoji, active from jeju_user where email=#{email}
select user_no, email, nickname, created_dt, view_cnt, emoji from jeju_user where active=1 and nickname=#{nickname}
select user_no, email, nickname, created_dt, view_cnt, active, emoji from jeju_user where active=1 and nickname like(concat('%',#{keyword},'%'))
mapper.delete: delete from jeju_liked_user where user_no=#{loginUserNo} and liked_user_no=#{likedUserNo}
mapper.select: select u.user_no, u.nickname, u.emoji from jeju_user u inner join jeju_liked_user lu on u.user_no=lu.liked_user_no where u.active=1 and lu.user_no=#{loginUserNo}
mapper.update: update jeju_user set view_cnt= view_cnt + 1 where user_no=#{userNo}
mapper.select: select user_no, email, nickname, created_dt, view_cnt, active, emoji from jeju_user order by view_cnt desc
